news.title: Rail ministry told to explain 'contradictory stand' on rehabilitation policy
news.para: The bench was hearing the plea against an order passed by the Gujarat HC, directing eviction of over 10,000 slum dwellers living near railway lines in Surat.

news.title: More families to be displaced by Noida airport's second phase, says report
news.para: Explaining why more families would need to be displaced, an official pointed out that many houses and other such structures had come up on the plots over the past couple of years.

news.title: Urban development bodies set up for Coimbatore, Tirupur
news.para: The announcement to create a separate body for the fast-growing districts were made in the revised budget speech on August 8.

news.title: Awfis leases 64,000 sq ft space to WayCool Foods in Bengaluru & Chennai
news.para: The deal was facilitated by CBRE South Asia. Awfis plans to reach 100 centres before the end of 2021.

news.title: Ingka Centres to invest Rs 3,500 crore to build mixed-use development in Gurugram
news.para: Ingka Centres 52nd meeting place will be developed under the new Livat brand. Construction will start in early 2022 and is expected to generate more than 2,500 jobs.

news.title: Thiruvananthapuram: SIA report recommends rehabilitation of people
news.para: The study by the institute of rural development has recommended rehabilitation of people who will be evicted from Panathura, Koonamthuruthu and Kilayantemudumbu. As much as 54.105 ares of land belonging to 16 individuals will be acquired for the project.

news.title: Asian Development Bank keen to offer loan for Patna metro rail project
news.para: "The ADB is ready to extend support for the further expansion in metro lines, stations and alignments and they made an offer in the first round meeting with them. If everything goes well, we can plan for the possible expansion of the metro,” the official said.

news.title: Demolish illegal buildings on Musi nalas: NGT committee
news.para: The committee, following its inspection wherein it found several buildings to be unauthorised, also recommended action against officials who permitted such constructions.

news.title: How construction sites are causing congestion, adding to pollution load
news.para: ​Vehicular emissions due to their slowing down of traffic on the blocked road are adding to the pollution load in the area. Though Delhi government has lifted the ban on construction sites, digging work has impacted the smooth movement of vehicles.

news.title: Increase property tax collection: Nashik municipal commissioner
news.para: Jadhav also directed the officials to conduct surveys and bring the properties that are without building and construction certificate (BCC) under the tax net.

news.title: Nagpur civic body begins process to auction properties of 600 tax defaulters
news.para: NMC deputy commissioner Milind Meshram told TOI that public notice warning auction of 12 properties owing arrears of over Rs5 lakh has been issued on November 21.

news.title: Plot owners seek timeline from YEIDA for handover
news.para: “Majority of the allottees have paid 60-70% of their dues while some have paid the entire amount. We were promised delivery of the plots within three years, but more than six years have passed,” said association president Tejveer Rana.

news.title: Gurugram: DTCP seals building for norms violation in DLF-2
news.para: Acting on a complaint from a local resident, the enforcement team of DTCP visited the site and found unauthorised construction, zoning violations in stilt areas and filling of cutouts in contravention to the OC norms, officials told TOI.

news.title: Raymond set to rejig businesses, put professional boards in place
news.para: The group had literally started its real estate business during the pandemic constructing its first project at its Thane land parcel, earlier a mill land.

news.title: ED conducts searches against IREO group in money laundering case
news.para: ​The raids were conducted at the premises linked to the CEO and CFO of the group under the provisions of the anti-money laundering law.
